title: Number of road deaths in Germany 2006 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of fatalities. In total the number of data points it has is 13.
In general Number of fatalities has fallen over the Year.

Number of fatalities is roughly constant from 2006 to 2007, gradually decreasing from 2007 to 2010, slightly increasing from 2010 to 2011, slightly decreasing from 2011 to 2012, and finally roughly constant from 2012 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum Number of fatalities, about 5091.0 was reported at Year 2006
Minimum Number of fatalities about 3180.0 was reached at Year 2017
